Author: sunnshine67
Text: Sis this is a red flag. He knows about your disorder and he still told you he liked thinner girls? That’s super fucked up. It’s not like a necessary piece of info he needed to tell you, like that sweater makes you look fat, it’s a piece of info that he knows will get in your head and feed into your problems, and he said it anyway

Author: TheCuntInTheRye
Text: If you’re in therapy, I think it would be a good idea to bring him into a session with you so you can explain how it makes you feel with a mediator. Otherwise, this relationship is going to be really harmful for you, but that’s my opinion from what you’ve said! Bottom line, you need to tell him that he needs to be more careful with his words. As a man myself, it’s key to know when to shut the fuck up; shit can hurt even when you don’t mean it to.
